full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUST Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service Budget Bureau No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (Fill in with typewriter or print in block letters in ink) I, VISHVANATH VINAYAK PHATAK Residing at 6602 N 13th STREET (Name) (Street and number) PHILADELPHIA, PENNA 19126 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code, If in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 7-9-1936 at BARODA INDIA . Also, answer either a, b or c, as appropriate (Date) (City) I (Country) if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization 9363866 (b) If a United States citizen through parent (s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number 2. That I am 34 years of age and have resided in the United States since SEPTEMBER 1960 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 6602 N 13th St. PHILADELPHIA, PENNA 19126 NAME MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT VINAYAK GOVIND PHATAH M 68 INDIA MARRIED FATHER VIMALA VINAYAK PHATAK F. 62 INDIA MARRIED MOTHER 4. (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of PROFESSOR with TEMPLE UNIVERSITY (Name of concern) at PHILADELPHIA and derive a net annual income of $14200+ (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country $1936.56. (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $6500.00 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $5880.00 market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 6602 N PHILADELPHIA valued at $22,500.00 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $16260.00 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $64,500.00 cash surrender value of $ NONE . (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of com- mercial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. Enterprise fund 45 shares share $315 CREF 128 Comstock fund 100 shares 5/share 445 #40/on # Shares 5120 (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) Total # 5880 Form 1-134 (Rev. 12-9-66)
